summary: The story of four children who walk three thousand miles to get to the world cup. On the way they encounter many things such as HIV and child prostitution.
cast: Eriya Ndayambaje|Roger Jean Nsengiyumva|Sanyu Joanita Kintu|Yves Dusenge|Sherrie Silver|Emmanuel Jal|Presley Chweneyagae|Rapulana Seiphemo|Patrick Mofokeng|Richard Lukunku|Moky Mukura|Leleti Khumalo|Tony Caprari|Keketso Semoko|Ayuub Kasasa Mago|Kennedy Jones Mazimpaka|Chan Marti|Lehlohonolo Makoko|Sam Kyagambidwa|Elizabeth Serunye|Francise Motsepe|Treasure Bulose|Jabulani Mouze Phambana|Amini Cishugi|Anzor Alem
title: Africa United
